text: Reflections in a Golden Eye is a 1967 American drama movie directed by John Huston and based on the 1941 novel of the same name by Carson McCullers. It stars Elizabeth Taylor, Marlon Brando, Brian Keith, Julie Harris, with Robert Forster and Harvey Keitel in their movie debuts. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. and was unsuccessful at box office. ==Other websites== * Category:1967 drama movies Category:1960s LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Reflections in a Golden Eye (movie)
